message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.NE 

The paper proposes a method for continual learning in classification tasks using metric learning. This falls under the broad category of machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The method involves embedding samples and prototypes, which is commonly used in computer vision (cs.CV) and natural language processing (cs.CL) tasks. Additionally, the paper mentions the use of neural networks, which is a common technique in neural engineering (cs.NE). Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.CL, and cs.NE.
